====================
**Aviation Turbine Fuels & Heating Fuel Oil Tender - Regional Master Standing Offer**
======================
**Contracting Entity**
------------------
* Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Contact: Hiltz, Jackson, jackson.hiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, (613) 296-6611

**Procurement Summary**
-----------------------
The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking proposals for a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) to supply Aviation Turbine Fuels (Into Plane) and Heating Fuel Oil to various federal departments in Iqaluit, Nunavut. The procurement aims to secure a reliable supply of these essential products for a period of three years, with the option to extend for two additional one-year periods.

**Notice and Tender**
-------------------
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Best Overall Proposal
* Trade Agreements: CETA, WTO-AGP, CPTPP, CFTA, FTAs with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and UK
* Language of Documentation: English and French

**Scope of Work**
----------------
The successful supplier will be responsible for delivering Aviation Turbine Fuels and Heating Fuel Oil to various federal departments in Iqaluit, Nunavut, as required by the identified user, from September 1, 2022 to July 31, 2027. The procurement also covers the option for two one-year extensions from August 1, 2025 to July 31, 2026 and from August 1, 2026 to July 31, 2027.

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement**
-------------------------------------
The Nunavut Land Claim Agreement applies to this procurement, specifically for deliveries to Iqaluit, Nunavut.

**Timeline**
-----------
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-08-25T14:00:00
* Delivery Date: September 1, 2022 to July 31, 2027

**Important Notice**
-----------------
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Suppliers may submit a bid, and all interested suppliers must comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the request for proposal.
